Text: Re RedploymentI highly appreciate your consideration Best regards Rehman Vince J CT AM To Rehman SharifENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re Redployment Rehman Thanks for you message My group hires almost exclusively people with background in quantitative disciplines math physics or computer programming I shall send your resume to some other units in the company that are looking for people with good skills and experience Vince Rehman NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Vince J CT cc Subject Redployment Vince I am a redeployment candidate out of CALME region and in the process of exploring opportunities within Enron I have very extensive background in financial analysis and economic structuring I am interested learning more about your group to find out if my skills and abilities could serve the present and future needs of your group Attached is my resume for your review any guidance you could provide would be greatly appreciated Regards Rehman Sharif
